title: The Magic School Bus
short_plot_summary: Ms. Frizzle takes her class on wild adventures in her magic school bus to teach them about science and the world around them.
explanation: The iconic magic school bus, which Ms. Frizzle and her students ride on their adventures
A microscope, symbolizing the focus on scientific exploration and discovery in the show
A dinosaur, representing one of the exciting adventures the class takes to learn about prehistoric times
A volcano, illustrating another thrilling adventure, this time to learn about volcanic activity and earth science
A snowflake, symbolizing the various climate and weather-related adventures the class embarks on during the show
